text: Oliver Stokowski (born 8 August 1962) is a German film and stage actor. He is best known for his per formance as Schütte - Prisoner No. 82 in Das Experiment. In 2014 he won the Grimme-Preis. ==Selected filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Film |- ! Year ! Title !
